thread.title: Quiet weekend in an excellent location.
thread.title_full: Quiet weekend in an excellent location. - Review of Premier Inn London Southwark (Borough Market) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: 907CByrne
title: Quiet weekend in an excellent location.
text: Comfortable clean room, ideal location and friendly staff. We will definitely return again soon. We were lucky that our room wasn't located beside the elevators and will be putting this in as a special request next time.
